ygData.msgSnippet: Yggdrasil watches as his plan fails utterly. Yggdrasil: So much for passivity! Yggdrasil Prime, Maximize! His thick tree bark hide reveals his robot form. He

Yggdrasil watches as his plan fails utterly.

Yggdrasil: So much for passivity! Yggdrasil Prime, Maximize!

His thick tree bark hide reveals his robot form. He looks stunningly 
like Optimus Prime, but he seems less tolerant and far less cautious 
when it comes to fighting.

He opens fire with his two giant machine guns, mainly aiming Gatara 
and Torin, and fires four shots of his particle gun. He dodges most 
shots but still gets scratched over his chest.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Unfortunately, intimidation tactics have little effect on the Rogue 
> forces, with the lone exception of Jayde.  They've all seen things 
> much scarier than an attacking tree-creature, regardless of its 
size.
> 
> Gatara, the closest Rogue (also the biggest), sees one tree headed 
> for her own noggin, but knocks it aside with a fist and squeezes 
both 
> triggers on her weapon, sending both a hail of magnum bullets and a 
> grenade at this ferocious enemy.
> 
> Devilcat steps forward, allowing the falling timbers to bounce 
> harmlessly off his force shield.  Then he retaliates with several 
> energy bursts from his laser sword.
> 
> Jayde yelps and scrambles back, looking for an opening to bring her 
> own nailgun to bear.  Torin, Riekan, and Fury are out of reach for 
> Yggdrasil's initial attack, but they fight back anyhow: Torin fires 
> his plasma blaster, Riekan launches an explosive harpoon, and Fury 
> (after transforming) opens up with his cybervenom gun.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Seeing Gatara's gun pointing at him, Yggdrasil is taken between 
not 
> > moving and seeming like any other tree or moving and opening fire. 
> He 
> > can't exactly seem like any other tree because the shots will 
> reveal 
> > that he has metal plates all over.
> > 
> > Slag, he thought, they got me now...
> > 
> > Unless...
> > 
> > The huge tree moved. Two of the big branches started bending down 
> with 
> > a cracking sound, but not breaking. Then, four eyes and a gaping 
> mouth 
> > appeared on the trunk. He roared.
> > 
> > Yggdrasil planned to act on intimidation. Since his beast mode was 
> > bigger than his robot mode, and that he was 13 ft tall as a robot, 
> it 
> > would be achievable. But he wanted to add some effect.
> > 
> > He swung his arms around, breaking the other trees nearby and 
> sending 
> > those tumbling down either in front of him or directly at the 
> Rogues.
> > 
> > Meanwhile, some of Gatara's shots had hit, but they had done no 
> more 
> > than light armor damage.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > "I want them converted to jamming beacons, then we'll place them 
> at 
> > > strategic points to knock out all enemy communications and 
sensor 
> > > scans," Devilcat explains.  "Right now, though, we have to 
> resolve 
> > > some border troubles of our own.  Anyone know where our intruder 
> got 
> > > to?"
> > > 
> > > Fury, still in beast form, prowls around.  "I can smell 
something 
> > > unnatural besides us.  He's here somewhere - whoever he is."
> > > 
> > > Torin transforms to robot form, having a better idea.  "Let's 
> see; 
> > if 
> > > I uplink my computer to Rogue Star's sensor array, I should be 
> able 
> > > to nail down the Maximal's location ... Gatara, take two steps 
to 
> > > your left, turn around, and start shooting."
> > > 
> > > Gatara blinks, then follows the suggestion - which puts 
Yggdrasil 
> > > dead center in her crosshairs when she pulls the trigger on her 
> > > machine gun!
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > Don't move, the huge tree bot thought to himself. A single 
move 
> > and 
> > > > they all start to fire at you.
> > > > 
> > > > Yggdrasil looked continued to listen, swearing inside and 
> hoping 
> > > those 
> > > > guys weren't too curious. He wanted to know more about the 
> > Maximals 
> > > > and their whereabouts, but he could do nothing until these 
guys 
> > > talked 
> > > > of the subject or went away.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > > > > -- Noir --
> > > > > 
> > > > > Noir nods her approval of Gatara's work. "Well done Gatara, 
> this 
> > > > > should definately be an obvious hint for future enemies." 
She 
> > > scans 
> > > > > the rest of the Rogues where were also gazing appraisingly.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Noir then remembers her and Torin's mission before being 
> > summoned 
> > > > > outside, "Devilcat,  Torin and I have collected as many of 
> those 
> > > > > communicator beacons that we could find. They are located in 
> a 
> > > > > container near the entrance to the storage bay. Where do you 
> > want 
> > > > > them?"
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > > > Torin ambles after her.  When they get outside, they find 
> > > Devilcat 
> > > > > > and Riekan already there.  Jayde and Fury arrive soon 
> after.  
> > > The 
> > > > > > thunder of jets soon announces Gatara's arrival as well.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > "Ah, there you are." Devilcat says to the group in 
> > > > > general.  "Gatara, 
> > > > > > may I assume everything went smoothly?"
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > "Got their heads on poles and their bodies blown away."  
> > > Gatara's 
> > > > > > description matches her usual notion of proper corpse 
> disposal 
> > -
> > >  
> > > > > put 
> > > > > > the head on display and disintegrate the rest.  It's a 
loud 
> > and 
> > > > > clear 
> > > > > > message not to mess with the Rogues.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > OOC: Anyone who wants can stumble across this grisly 
> exhibit 
> > in 
> > > > > the 
> > > > > > future.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > > > > > > -- Noir --
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > "Alright." Noir says. "We'll leave the beacons here and 
> get 
> > > them 
> > > > > > > after the situation is resolved."
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > She heads out of the storage bay, and starts making her 
> way 
> > > out 
> > > > > of 
> > > > > > > the Rogue Star with a quick pace.
